entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is hesitant to share information with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A wizard and Harry's acquaintance, who has searched the Malfoys' house.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: The son of a wealthy pure-blood family, mentioned as having a conversation with Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts, who is involved in a conversation with Malfoy.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A werewolf and teacher at Hogwarts, who is listening to Harry's conversation with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: celestina warbeck
entities.description: A singer, whose ballad is playing in the background during Harry's conversation with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The book series that this story is a part of.

entities.name: prophet
entities.description: A newspaper that has reported on Mr. Weasley's search of the Malfoys' house.

relationships.description: Harry shares information with Mr. Weasley about his conversation with Malfoy and Snape.
Mr. Weasley has searched the Malfoys' house, but found nothing out of place.
